scripts.dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml up -d && node -e "setTimeout(() => {}, 2000)" && pnpm run db:push && dotenv -e .env.local -- pnpm exec turbo dev
scripts.db:migrate: dotenv -e .env.local -- pnpm exec prisma migrate dev --schema ./packages/database/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset: dotenv -e .env.test -- pnpm exec prisma migrate reset --force --schema ./packages/database/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:push: dotenv -e .env.local -- pnpm exec prisma db push --schema ./packages/database/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.test:gradual: pnpm run docker:test && pnpm run db:reset && pnpm test && pnpm test:e2e && pnpm run docker:test:down
scripts.docker:test: pnpm run build && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml --env-file .env.test up --build --renew-anon-volumes --remove-orphans -d && node -e "setTimeout(() => {}, 5000)"
scripts.verify: pnpm lint && pnpm test && pnpm build && pnpm test:e2e
